About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Ondřej Marván, student of University of Finance and Administration, with current placement at the University of Gloucestershire. Before moving to the United Kingdom, Ondřej Spend six months as an exchange student at Athens University of Economics and Business, according to ranking the most prestigious economic university in Greece.

I am trying to adapt to every upcoming event in my life. This scenario includes a wide variety of skills and abilities which I would like to gain through several fields of studies (e.g. management, finance, marketing, IT, banking or industry transformation).

My hobbies are compound of physical and cognitive activities in order to get on superior physical and mental health. This hasn't helped only to me but also my current and future stakeholders.

One of my current passions is studio&street photography (my photography Portfolio).

My career experience covers working in the bank as a personal banker or volunteering for AIESEC Organisation in cities like Athens, Prague or Hanoi, where I was teaching English in Project Empower Vietnam.
